author: Andy Chalk
description: Cox said actor Maxence Cazorla deserves credit for the job, and the internet agrees.
title: The circle is closed as Clair Obscur mocap actor Maxence Cazorla thanks Charlie Cox for his kind words: 'Bringing Gustave to life was a team effort, and I’m honored to have played my part in it'

author: Andy Chalk
description: The BF6 freebie includes "three playlists, including a casual multiplayer experience, across three maps."
title: The Battlefield 6 free trial is live, and if you're new to the scene EA has a detailed guide to get you started

author: Dominic Tarason
description: Did I mention the new difficulty options, progression systems and combat mechanics?
title: Enormous mod Elden Ring Reforged refreshes and rebalances every inch of the game, works with Seamless Co-op, and even throws in a Crackdown orb-style scavenger hunt

author: Nick Evanson
description: The answer isn't as simple as you might think it is.
title: Nvidia RTX 5070 or AMD RX 9070: Which graphics card is the perfect Black Friday GPU on a $500 upgrade budget?

author: Diego Perez
description: Build the best burst assault rifle.
title: Best X9 Maverick loadout in Black Ops 7

author: Tyler Colp
description: Finally, some good news.
title: Despite Krafton ownership, Last Epoch dev won't charge for its first expansion and isn't pivoting to AI: 'To be clear, our development approach is not changing'

author: Andy Chalk
description: Splitgate 2 is also coming back sooner than expected: Instead of early 2026, the relaunch is now slated for December.
title: After its 'make FPS great again' controversy, Splitgate 2 is relaunching with a humbler tone: 'The goal is to grow over time, not aim for a massive splash on day 1'

author: Tim Clark
description: Yousa ready for Renegades?
title: The first thing Bungie asked LucasFilm about its Star Wars-themed Destiny 2 expansion was: "What is the bad version of this?"

description: Gift ideas for you or someone you know that's gaming on-the-go.
title: The PC Gamer handheld gaming PC gift guide

author: Sam Desatoff
description: Moonlighter 2 combines the ideas of several games into one, though it doesn't yet excel at any one element.
title: Moonlighter 2 made me reckon with how 'cozy' a shopkeeping roguelite with a heavy helping of Hades can get

author: Lauren Morton
description: Novelist and game writer Naomi Alderman has bought back the rights to the Zombies, Run! exercise app she's been writing episodes of for more than a decade.
title: Finally some good buyout news: A writer just bought back the game she co-created from a blockchain company so it 'doesn’t end up being turned into AI slop'

author: James Bentley
description: It can even work as a Stream Deck.
title: The best MMO gaming mouse is almost half price this Black Friday and even cheaper than in the last Prime Day

description: Making lasting connections.
title: You can forget battery anxiety because the best wired Hall effect controller is down around its lowest ever price in the Black Friday sales

author: Rick Lane
description: Embracing change.
title: After splurging on EA, Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund is reportedly tightening its pursestrings, due to 'financial distress' caused by numerous troubled projects

author: Andy Edser
description: What else does it need to do, dance?
title: I'm not just tapping the sign, I'm banging it with a sledgehammer: The RTX 5070 Ti MSI Vector 16 HX is still just $1,299 this Black Friday

author: Rich Stanton
description: Choo choo!
title: Hero modder who started the Thomas the Tank Engine meme with Skyrim thumbs his nose at 'legal threats' and 'black vans with the Mattel logo' by modding Thomas into Morrowind: 'I have issues with authority'

author: Lincoln Carpenter
description: Fishing involves more sniper rifles and bare-knuckle fisticuffs than I remember.
title: This fishing game awards bonus XP for no-scoping an airborne mackerel, and I think that's beautiful

author: Jacob Fox
description: This is my absolute favorite handheld gaming PC.
title: Lenovo takes the fight to the Steam Deck with this Black Friday deal dropping the Legion Go S to $450

author: Lincoln Carpenter
description: Valve told Santa Ragione its game featured child exploitation. The studio says otherwise.
title: Horror game maker accuses Valve of 'censorship' after its game about nude human 'Horses' is rejected by Steam: 'Lawful works should not be made unreachable by a monopolistic storefront's opaque decisions'

author: Nick Evanson
description: Top-tier specs, bottom-tier price tag.
title: Thanks to a $40 Black Friday discount, AverMedia's best value 4K capture card makes everything else look overpriced in comparison

description: Time to get yourself a titan.
title: Quantic Dream's upcoming MOBA is opening its doors for a closed beta weekend in just a couple of weeks, but only a few players will make the cut

author: James Bentley
description: It's the best that (little) money can buy.
title: If you're in search of a budget gaming mouse, none will take the crown off this Black Friday deal at just $30

author: Andrea Shearon
description: A little version control goes a long way.
title: Another Fallout 4 update fixes performance issues while leaving modders angry, but it doesn't have to be this way

author: Joshua Wolens
description: It's not the hours in the booth, it's how you use them.
title: In a relatable bout of impostor syndrome, Clair Obscur actor Charlie Cox says please give all the credit to mocap actor Maxence Cazorla after he nabs a Game Awards nom

author: Jacob Fox
description: Probably my favorite laptop I've used.
title: This laptop is for PC gamers with MacBook envy and it's just got a $630 discount, putting it at $1,200 for Black Friday

description: The PC equivalent of holding the door open for the burglar on their way in.

description: Clash of the Titans.
title: Spellcasters Chronicles is my kind of MOBA, where I can summon skyscraper-sized titans, create an army of lizards, and just live happily in the chaos

description: So good, it hertz.

description: Every quest you need to beat, so you're not wasting your time each Expedition cycle.
title: All Arc Raiders quests and how to beat them

description: I don't care what you say, 14-inch gaming laptops are the best gaming laptops.
title: Black Friday gaming laptop deals: I've used each of these ace 14-inch machines, and would be a very happy gamer with any of them

description: "The game damage numbers should not be restricted by netcode", Saber believes.

author: Jacob Ridley
description: Cut Google out of your life, one app at a time.
title: Proton helped me ditch Google for emails, calendar, cloud storage and more and you can get its excellent VPN for $2.49/month this Black Friday

description: Seems totally achievable, good luck with that.
title: Google needs to double its AI serving capacity 'every six months' and scale 'the next 1000x in 4-5 years' according to an internal presentation

description: Pre-builts can come in clutch when there are component shortages.

description: Unless you need to, of course.
title: Please stop scooting around while you're downed in Arc Raiders: it's making you die faster

description: It's my main display for work and gaming, and I can't recommend it highly enough.

description: Insider Trading has some hard lessons to teach about making the numbers go up.
title: This Balatro-inspired stock-trading roguelike marks the first time I've ever screwed up in a deckbuilder by making my deck too good

description: Joined by Ubisoft's 2012 I Am Alive, no less, which it turns out is alive.

description: Samsung offers small storage solutions at a tiny price.
title: Can't wait to share your game library between your Steam Deck, Steam Machine, and Steam Frame? Grab a spacious and speedy MicroSD card this Black Friday

author: Rick Lane
description: Dark magic.
title: Magic: The Gathering's original art director says one of its most famous expansions was a protest against the Satanic Panic: 'I was getting really tired of the judgmental, holier-than-thou attitude coming from a lot of conservative so-called Christians'

author: James Bentley
description: Asus has made a bit of a beauty.
title: This is absolutely the best gaming keyboard today and it's just dropped to its lowest ever price

description: A gaming chair for the discerning gamer.
title: The best thing about this gaming chair is that it doesn't look like one: it's also down to $500 for Black Friday

description: We were given this whole planet, and look what we've done with it.
title: Microsoft spits in God's face with Xbox-style Crocs that cost $80 and the sum total of your dignity

description: "Credits are basically a free space."
title: Demonschool's credits go one step further than names and job titles, adding full descriptions for designer roles: 'We wanted to give people proper, actual credit'

author: Ian Evenden
description: The undisputed king of integrated graphics when it works.
title: iCame, iSaw, iConquered: With its new M5 chip, the Apple MacBook Pro is now a gaming PC. Just, y'know, without the games

description: It's Always Sunny in Micronesia, and Africa, and Nepal, and Montana, and... the Mesolithic era?
title: Live-action Far Cry TV series starring It's Always Sunny's Rob Mac will mimic the games' standalone format, with each season given 'a new setting following a new cast of characters'
